content.text: Match ends, Swansea City 1, Stoke City 2.
Second Half ends, Swansea City 1, Stoke City 2.
Attempt missed. Xherdan Shaqiri (Stoke City) left footed shot from outside the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by Darren Fletcher.
Foul by Peter Crouch (Stoke City).
Mike van der Hoorn (Swansea City) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. Mike van der Hoorn (Swansea City) right footed shot from outside the box is too high.
Attempt missed. Tom Carroll (Swansea City) left footed shot from outside the box misses to the left. Assisted by Sam Clucas.
Attempt blocked. Sam Clucas (Swansea City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Attempt blocked. Jordan Ayew (Swansea City) right footed shot from the right side of the box is blocked.
Corner,  Swansea City. Conceded by Moritz Bauer.
Attempt saved. Sam Clucas (Swansea City) left footed shot from outside the box is saved in the top left corner.
Offside, Stoke City. Xherdan Shaqiri tries a through ball, but Badou Ndiaye is caught offside.
Offside, Swansea City. Angel Rangel tries a through ball, but Jordan Ayew is caught offside.
Attempt blocked. Tammy Abraham (Swansea City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Attempt saved. Sam Clucas (Swansea City) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.
Attempt saved. Sam Clucas (Swansea City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Tom Carroll with a through ball.

Corner,  Swansea City. Conceded by Erik Pieters.
Attempt saved. Sam Clucas (Swansea City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom left corner. Assisted by Martin Olsson with a cross.
Attempt blocked. Martin Olsson (Swansea City) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked.
Attempt blocked. André Ayew (Swansea City) left footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Attempt saved. André Ayew (Swansea City) left footed shot from the right side of the six yard box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Tammy Abraham.
Substitution, Swansea City. Sam Clucas replaces Nathan Dyer.
Foul by Nathan Dyer (Swansea City).

Second Half begins Swansea City 1, Stoke City 2.
First Half ends, Swansea City 1, Stoke City 2.
